page.title: 08LOCAL INDUSTRY 2
page.content: INDE COOPE DISTRIBUTION DEPOT The Inde Coope depot is a collecting and distributing centre for{beer and } {cider.}The breweries using the depot are{Guiness,Bass,Charrington and {Gaymers.}It has been in Effingham for 14 years.The beverages come in from Wrexham,Burton and Romford.It distributes to Wimbledon,Windsor, Aldershot and Fleet in Hampshire,using flat bed lorries.There are{43 workers} and one manager. COLETS EARTH BORING Colets Earth Boring of Effingham specialises in boring into bedrock and then driving in piles for new buildings. The company has a{workforce {of eleven}most of whom live locally, although the largest part of their work is in Essex. The company has been established in the area for 25 years.
